alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, southeastern Victoria and northeastern Refugio Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Victoria to near Port Oconnor to 19 miles south of Matagorda. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Port Oconnor, McFaddin, Guadalupe, Point Comfort, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Long Mott, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Green Lake, Brentwood Subdivision, Telferner, Tivoli, Matagorda Island State Park, Downtown Victoria and Alamo Beach. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 632 and 645. US Highway 77 between mile markers 572 and 606. US Highway 87 between mile markers 802 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
